tasks.task: Operate farm tractors equipped with different engine technologies.
subtasks: Spend time in a tractor with EGR technology for extended periods.
Note the machine's responsiveness, power output, and operational characteristics.
Switch to a tractor with SCR technology and repeat the assessment.

subtasks: Arrange farm visits to show the tractors in action.
Provide hands-on demonstrations (allowing customers to operate the tractors for a trial).

tasks.task: Research exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) versus selective catalytic reduction (SCR) technologies.
subtasks: Read manufacturer literature on both EGR and SCR engines.

tasks.task: Conduct a field trial of two different farm tractors.

Evaluate fuel efficiency during the test.
Document maintenance requirements for the EGR tractor.
Repeat the same tests with a tractor using SCR technology.
Compare the data from both tractors.

tasks.task: Present the findings of the field trial to a group of farmers.
subtasks: Compile a report of the tests and results.
Create visual presentations (slides, charts) to aid presentation.
Conduct a Q&A session with farmers after the presentation.
